categories.title: Bedroom
categories.description: is a room in a house for the bed, so it's mainly used for sleeping. If you live in a one-bedroom apartment, it has exactly one room for the bed. To sound old fashioned, call it your bedchamber.

categories.title: Living Room
categories.description: Enjoy a great living room aesthetics with your family  Designs created for increased comfortability

categories.title: Home Office
categories.description: is a space designated in a person's residence for official business purposes. It provides a space for those that are self-employed or work remotely for an employer.

categories.title: Gaming Room
categories.description: is playing an electronic video game, which is often done on a dedicated gaming console, PC or smartphone. People who often play video games are called gamers.
